Invitation to Marriott Selection Day 15/07
Congratulations!
We would like to invite you to the Marriott Selection Day on Friday 15th July. Please see details below. You should respond to confirm your availability here.
Date: 15/07/2016
Arrive: 9.30am
Leave: 3.45pm
Address: Grosvenor House, 86 - 90 Park Lane, London, W1K 7TN.
Please note: There are a number of Marriott Hotels nearby so make sure to plan ahead and go to the correct one. We work with a number of hotels throughout London so you won't necessarily be working at Grosvenor House for your placement.
Schedule of the day:
9.30am – 10.30am Welcome and refreshments
10.40am - 11.10am Team building activity
11.15am - 12.15pm Presentations (3 mins per person)
12.15pm – 1pm Lunch
1.10pm – 2pm Group project
2pm – 2.15pm Wrap up – Q&A session
2.15pm – 3.45pm Interviews
3.45pm onwards Leave
What to bring:
If you have not submitted your presentation you should bring this with you on the day. If you have already submitted it then there is nothing you need to bring.
What next?
There are a few things you need to do to prepare for the day. Marriott will expect you to research their organisation before the interview. They will also ask you questions about yourself. You can make sure that you are as prepared as possible by ensuring that you do the following:
Read the job description carefully Research Marriott by looking at their website Read the interview preparation document attached to this email Read over your CV Remember that Marriott staff will be observing candidates all day so even if you are not taking part in an activity you should be acting professionally at all times.
We look forward to seeing you there.
Step Forward.
